definition: north/the northern part a country/China north of the Yellow River

square/power or involution (math.)/upright/honest/fair and square/direction/side/party (to a contract, dispute etc)/place/method/prescription (medicine)/just when/only or just/classifier for square things/abbr. for square or cubic meter

pinyin: Zhong1 guo2 Bei3 fang1 Gong1 ye4 Gong1 si1

definition: Northern Nationalities University NNU at Yingchuan, Ningxia (former Northwestern Second College for Nationalities)
pinyin: Bei3 fang1 Min2 zu2 Da4 xue2

definition: (bird species of China) oriental cuckoo (Cuculus optatus)

sentences.english: Many southerners said all of the North was responsible for the raid.
sentences.chinese: 许多南方人说，所有的北方人都应该对这次袭击负责。

sentences.english: Staggering tasks confronted the people of the United States , North and South , when the Civil War ended.
sentences.chinese: 内战结束后，美国南北方的人民都面临着艰巨的任务。

sentences.english: Shall iron break the northern iron and the steel?
sentences.chinese: 人岂能将铜与铁，就是北方的铁折断呢。

sentences.english: Perhaps, this is the unbending youth from northeast of China.
sentences.chinese: 也许这就是一个北方大男孩的那种倔强吧？

sentences.english: Southern leaders were pleased with the anti-war movement in the North.
sentences.chinese: 南方领导人很高兴地看到北方的反战运动。

sentences.english: At the same time, the North is going through a murky, ill-understood succession crisis.
sentences.chinese: 同时，北方正在经历一个模糊而难以读懂的接班危机。

sentences.english: Tariffs redistributed wealth from the South to the North.
sentences.chinese: 关税使得财富从南方流向北方。

sentences.english: Hungarians have had the ambition of becoming the masters of the Central Plains for many years.
sentences.chinese: 北方的匈奴多年来一直有入主中原的野心。

sentences.english: It is, essentially, a rejection of Hellenic intellectualism by the sentimentalism of the North.
sentences.chinese: 它在本质上是北方的重情主义对希腊尚知主义的排斥。

sentences.english: China borders on Mongolia to the north.
sentences.chinese: 中国的北方同蒙古接邻。

sentences.english: After the late Tang dynasty, there were no new grottos appeared in northern China.
sentences.chinese: 晚唐以后，北方中原已经没有石窟造像作品出现。

sentences.english: South Korea, in particular, dreads the cost of rebuilding the North.
sentences.chinese: 尤其是韩国，对于重建北方的花销心存畏惧。

sentences.english: The steamer will go west by north.
sentences.chinese: 这艘轮船将向西偏北方向航行。

sentences.english: The Bian city king occupies just northern fertile burnt stone under of yell the earth jail.
sentences.chinese: 卞城王占据正北方沃焦石下的叫唤大地狱。

sentences.english: From 2001 to 2004, the city ambient air quality of the north China had been improved evidently.
sentences.chinese: 2004年，北方大部份城市空气质量有明显改善。

sentences.english: Prior to 2001, the Northern Areas were attracting a steadily growing stream of Western visitors.
sentences.chinese: 2001年以前北方地区吸引的西方游客稳步增长。

definition: south/the southern part of the country/the South
Northwest China (Shaanxi, Gansu, Qinghai, Ningxia, Xinjiang)
the northern part of the country/the North
Central Plain, the middle and lower regions of the Yellow river, including Henan, western Shandong, southern Shanxi and Hebei
cold weather, frozen ground (idiom); bitterly cold
Northeast Plain, also called the Manchurian Plain
